PHRASE.LANG: Awarded for supplying gunners who are successful in Phase 3 of the Killzone® event in the ISA fight against Helghast oppression. [#Legal]
Récompense pour avoir soutenu les tireurs et remporté la phase 3 de l'épreuve Killzone®, dans le combat de l'ISA contre l'oppression helghaste. [#Legal]
Wird für die Versorgung von Schützen vergeben, die in Welle 3 des Killzone®-Events im Kampf der ISA gegen die Unterdrückung der Helghast erfolgreich waren. [#Legal]
Assegnati per aver rifornito gli artiglieri vincenti nella fase 3 dell'evento Killzone® nella lotta degli ISA contro l'oppressione degli Helghast. [#Legal]
Otorgadas por proveer a los artilleros que tuvieron éxito en la 3.ª oleada del evento Killzone® en la batalla de la ISA contra la opresión Helghast. [#Legal]
Awarded for supplying gunners who are successful in Phase 3 of the Killzone® event in the ISA fight against Helghast oppression. [#Legal]
Awarded for supplying gunners who are successful in Phase 3 of the Killzone® event in the ISA fight against Helghast oppression. [#Legal]
